author: joes
msg: Document possible change in slurp() related to similar read-type functions from from mp2.

author: geoff
msg: switch the order of arguments in t_cmp() and t_is_equal() so that
the order matches Test::More::is() and other Test::More functions.
the new call is: t_cmp($received, $expected, $comment);  support
for $expected as the first argument marked as deprecated and will
be removed in the course of the next few release cycles.

author: joes
msg: Add config.nice support by copying the relevant m4 macros from apr's build/apr_common.m4 file.
